choiceresponse.p: Click the plus (+) button to create a new dashboard in Trainingland.

label.h3: Which of the following are available options within create mode?

checkboxgroup.choice: Search for items to add to this dashboard

div.p: To create a new dashboard and enter create mode, select the plus (+) button. In create mode, the following are available options: Dashboard title, dashboard description and the “Search for items to add to this dashboard” field.
